comments: Heather is the most encouraging teacher ever. Doesn\'t care what your thing is, she will help you perfect it. Her encouragement kept me at ACAD when I was considering dropping out.

Heather is super enthusiastic, relaxed, knowledgeable, and helpful. I loved print before I took this class and I love it even more now, and if I weren\'t going into Design, I would major in print. I still talk to Heather even though I am not in her class - she is super nice outside of class too, and super inclusive.

Best Teacher i have ever had, i love her to bits, she was very easy to communicate with and talk to about getting help with something or changing your habits. Very funny and enthusiastic about everything! wish she would teach every single one of my classes
Heather is an amazing teacher. Clearly explains everything and is really enthusiastic about student work.
heather is super nice (and nerdy funny!), easy to talk ideas through with. shes more "friend" material than "authority" figure. ive taken 2 of her classes, and would suggest it to anyone.

Heather is a great teacher. She is always friendly, and is willing to help with anything she can, whether it is related to her class or not. Definitely knew what she was talking about when it came to the material covered, and always offered useful advice. I would absolutely take another class with her. :)
Very enthusiastic. Kind of acts like a student. Sometimes she isn\'t clear on what will raise your grade, but she is helpful enough.
